overview: A site specific dance video set in Montr√©al high above the city streets. We join two women who meet and interact, sometimes oblivious to and sometimes hyper-aware of their surroundings. Twitch sets this intimate relationship against the backdrop of a big city sky, through a boiler room, down a wooden stairway, and out onto the street. Twitch is playful and poignant. Inventive camerwork, an innovative soundtrack and intrepid choreography.
title: Twitch
